title: Blueprint, "Desk-Various Woods, Formica, Polished Aluminum, Leather", March 14, 1932
markings: Stamp in lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 1648/F.S./WIDDICOMB/POLISHED ALUMINUM/ I. RUBBER BLK FORMICA/ORIENTAL WALNUT/II. ZEBRA WOOD/BROWN LEATHER, at right in stamp: ULLMAN/D./3-14-32/3/16/32, 3/16, 2, WIDDICOMB/2/16, 1, GPT.; inscribed at left: SPECIFICATIONS./COMBINATION NO. 1/POLISHED ALUMINUM/ORIENTAL WALNUT/RUBBED BLK BAKELITE TOP/COMBINATION NO. 2/POLISHED ALUMINUM/ZEBRA WOOD/LEATHER TOP (EAGLE -OTTAWA)/SUPER VEAL FIN./W-1; upper center: ALL EDGES VENEERED-/METAL WORK SUPPLIED BY DONALD DESKEY.; dimensions, instructions, materials throughout
description: Perspective and plans for desk. Leather or Bakelite top of desk, lower left side with small drawer and narrow cabinet with inner adjustable shelf. Kneehole at right, curved right side of desk surface. Legs at right in squared aluminum tubing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Desk-Various Woods, Formica, Polished Aluminum, Leather", March 14, 1932.
March 14, 1932. Blueprint on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-644.
